name: RPDeploySPAddIn
description: Deploy SharePoint hosted / provider hosted apps to SharePoint.
author: Sebastian Sch√ºtze, RazorSPoint

inputs.name: SharePointVersion
inputs.label: SharePoint Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version to witch the addIn should be deployed to.

inputs.name: AppFilePath
inputs.label: Path to App File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the .app file. This could be a deployment artifact or any location on the agent.

inputs.name: TargetWebUrl
inputs.label: Target Web Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL to the web, where the app should be installed.

inputs.name: AppVersion
inputs.label: App Version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Set the App Version in the App Manifest.
The following pattern should be used: 1.7.4.25. The meaning is as follow: Mayor.Minor.Revision.Build

inputs.name: RemoteMachine
inputs.label: Machines
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide a machine name with the full FQDNs!
Eg: dbserver.fabrikam.com,192.168.12.34
Or provide output variable of other tasks. Eg: $(variableName)

inputs.name: AdminLogin
inputs.label: Admin Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Administrator login for the target machines.

inputs.name: AdmninPassword
inputs.label: Admin Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Administrator password for the target machines.
It can accept variable defined in Build/Release definitions as '$(passwordVariable)'.
You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: ReinstallIfExisting
inputs.label: Reinstall App If Exists
inputs.helpMarkDown:
If checked the app will be first ininstalled of present on the target web URL.
WARNING: This means that the app web will be completely uninstalled!

inputs.name: AddInType
inputs.label: App is Provider Hosted
inputs.helpMarkDown: Is the app a provider hosted app?

inputs.name: RemoteAppUrl
inputs.label: Remote Web Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Url to starting page of the remote web.

inputs.name: ClientId
inputs.label: Client ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Client Id of the app, which registered on the target site collection.
